title: Thad Brown & Hooniverse' Jeff Glucker
description:
In this episode, Thaddeus is still chilling, having temporarily escaped from Dubai, and Hooniverse's (And Truck Central's) Jeff Glucker stops by the studio to hang with the boys. Jeff is a vintage car, beer, food, and truck enthusiast who is always a great guest. 


Check out Jeff's new show 'Test Drive Tuesdays' on Truck Central here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCkgw2Yd52tOKHqareJOOwVg

This show is available as a video!

https://youtu.be/8tlX5t4gf60
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
